GSD.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v5.15.77
GSD.description:
drm/msm/hdmi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.77 by commit b48949ab451eaf1e2c04c272c8a9a96a2b56546f, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit a3376e3ec81c5dd0622cbc187db76d2824d31c1c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/msm/hdmi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges
OSV.details:
drm/msm/hdmi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges
